channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Shinrin-Yoku (Forest Bathing) Brings Healing For People And Planet
item.description: Global studies show that spending time in forests boosts immunity, reduces stress, & protects mental health, while parks & cities, cut pollution, & fi...

item.title: iOS 18.7 Vs iOS 26— Here’s Which iPhone Update To Choose
item.description: Both iOS 26 and iOS 18.7 are available for anyone whose iPhone will run the software. Here's which iPhone update to choose.

item.title: FBI Warning—Do Not Use These Websites On Your Phone Or PC
item.description: No one is safe from attack — not even the FBI.

item.title: UNGA 2025 Confronts AI As A Global Governance Challenge

item.title: Value creation
